assetProfile.longBusinessSummary: Huaan Securities Co., Ltd., together with its subsidiaries, provides investment and financial products and services to retail, institutional, and industrial customers. It offers financial services and investment solutions to public and high-net-worth clients, including stock futures brokerage services and trading systems, financial product sales services, financing services, derivatives, investments consultancy, and other product services portfolio. The company also provides equity, bonds, and other sponsorship and underwriting services; corporate restructuring and restructuring, mergers and acquisitions financial advisory, asset securitization, and other services; various financing services through private equity funds, alternative investments, stock pledge, and other channels; risk management services through various types of trade, warehouse receipt pledge, and cooperative hedging services; and financial advisory services to the government. In addition, it offers customized services to various institutional investors, such as banks, public funds, and private funds covering institutional brokerage, research and investment consultants, product sales agents, etc., as well as other professional services comprising product custody, brokerage settlement, etc.; and engages in securities proprietary business which includes conducting investment transactions in equity securities, fixed-income securities, bulk commodities, and related securities derivatives with its funds; and market-making business on the market. The company was founded in 1991 and is headquartered in Hefei, China.
